recipes.title: Pumpkin Bread
recipes.description: A bread loaf made with pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: A classic soup with onion, carrots, celery, garlic, pasta, and chicken.

recipes.title: Apple Cobbler
recipes.description: An old fashioned cobbler with apples, cinnamon, and cake like batter. Traditionally topped with vanilla ice cream.

recipes.description: A creamy soup with butternut squash, sage, and various vegetables.

recipes.title: Roasted Potatoes
recipes.description: A universal side dish of diced potatoes and various herbs.
